critical_warnings: ⚠️ ONGOING WORK: Must send monthly notices to protect each month's materials
Single notice only protects that month and future deliveries
Failure to send monthly notices may forfeit prior months' lien rights
TX.notes: Using commercial deadlines for MVP (longer = safer). Residential toggle coming in v2.

lien_filing.name: Mechanic's Lien
lien_filing.description: 90 days after completion (or 30 days if Notice of Completion recorded)

critical_warnings: ⚠️ 20-day preliminary notice deadline is strictly enforced
Late notice limits recovery to work within 20 days of notice
⚠️ Deadline can shorten to 30 days if Notice of Completion recorded
CA.notes: Showing 90-day standard deadline. Add warning about potential 30-day acceleration.

preliminary_notice.name: Notice to Owner (NTO)
preliminary_notice.description: Within 45 days of first furnishing (or before starting work)

critical_warnings: ⚠️ Missing 45-day NTO deadline = COMPLETE LOSS of lien rights
Must record lien AND serve copy on owner within 15 days
Lien expires if lawsuit not filed within 1 year
FL.notes: Pro tip: Serve Notice to Owner BEFORE first delivery to eliminate deadline concerns.
